```{.r .cell-code}
library(fuzzyjoin)
library(gt)
VI <- read_csv("https://github.com/drjohnrussell/drjohnrussell.github.io/raw/refs/heads/master/posts/2025-01-05-fuzzyjoin-in-action/data/VIschools.csv")
```
